Literature.Title: The peculiar N- and (-termini of trichogin GA IV are needed for membrane interaction and human cell death induction at doses lacking antibiotic activity.
Literature.Author: Tavano R, Malachin G, De Zotti M, Peggion C, Biondi B, Forrnaggio F, Papini E

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=32±0µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=48±22µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=>64µM),Human epidermoid carcinoma A431(no activity data),Human promyelocytic leukemia HL-60(no activity data),Human lung carcinoma A549(no activity data)
